amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide that none of the funds in the bill may be used to award any new allocations under the market access program or to pay the salaries of personnel to award such allocations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 19 printed in the Congressional Record to provide that none of the funds in the bill may be used to award any new allocations under the market access program or to pay the salaries of personnel to award such allocations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Royce amendment (A028) Failed by recorded vote: 85 - 341 (Roll no. 220).
